DESCRIPTIONS: You applied #b
keyword.
keywords.

enemy.
enemies.

theGamblignant:Luck.NAME: Luck
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase all your dice rolls by #b
Decrease all your dice rolls by #b
, without exceeding their normal limits.

theGamblignant:LoseLuck.NAME: Luck Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b
Luck.

theGamblignant:Vim.NAME: Vim
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your next dice roll by #b
Decrease your next dice roll by #b
without exceeding its normal limit.

theGamblignant:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase dice rolls made on Skills by #b

theGamblignant:Charisma.NAME: Charisma
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase dice rolls made on Attacks by #b

theGamblignant:QuiverDance.NAME: Quiver Dance
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b
to the first roll you make each turn.

theGamblignant:Gatekeep.NAME: Gatekeep
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you fully block an attack, the attacker loses #b
Strength.

theGamblignant:Superstition.NAME: Superstition
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you roll a 1, deal #b
damage to all enemies.

theGamblignant:LoadedDice.NAME: Loaded Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you roll a die, deal #b
damage to a random enemy.

theGamblignant:FengShui.NAME: Feng Shui
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain 1d8 Block.

theGamblignant:FengShuiPlus.NAME: Feng Shui+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain 1d8 Block.

theGamblignant:AncestralAwakening.NAME: Ancestral Awakening
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a D8 is rolled, it results in an 8.

theGamblignant:TricksterMode.NAME: Trickster Mode
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b1d
Luck. At the end of your turn, lose #b1d

theGamblignant:ThiefForm.NAME: Thief Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, gain #b1d
Luck. Whenever you are attacked, lose #b1d
Luck.

theGamblignant:ThiefFormPlus.NAME: Thief Form+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, gain #b1d
Luck. Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, lose #b1d
Luck.

theGamblignant:SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Energy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, deal #b
damage to all enemies.

theGamblignant:Clairvoyant.NAME: Clairvoyant
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, gain #b
temporary Luck.

theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.NAME: Impending Doom
DESCRIPTIONS: After #b
turns, deal 88 damage to all enemies.
